nodes.text: Galactic Architecture 101 and the History of Centerpoint Station

Galactic Architecture 101 and the History of Centerpoint Station, also known as The World Puller the History of Centerpoint Station is a reference article written by Keith Kappel and uploaded to the Star Wars Blog on January 24, 2014. It detailed the history of Centerpoint Station.

In the article, Legacy of the Force: Betrayal was erroneously depicted as taking place around the same time as Legacy of the Force: Exile and Legacy of the Force: Fury, when the former actually took place before the latter two.
